Game: That's So Raven- Psychic on the Scene 2006-11-02T00:00:00-07:00 This game is a 3rd person adventure mystery game involving Raven and her friends Chelsea and Eddie. Raven receives a vision that her favorite theater is closing down and she enlists Chelsea and Eddie to get to the bottom of it. The game has an assortment of puzzles and mini-games which the 3 characters use to help get them closer to solving the mystery of the theatre.
